name: Pac-Man Ghost Bowling
overview:
Pac-Man Ghost Bowling is Namco's amazing new take on the classic game of skee-ball. With flashing light displays and a load of Pac-Man graphics and decals this ticket redemption machine will definitely attract a lot of attention for your gaming location.

The aim of the game is essentially the same as classic skee-ball. Players roll their balls up the inclined alley and try to bounce them into one of the scoring circles which are worth varying points.

Smaller than traditional skee-ball machines, Pac-Man Ghost bowling is fun family machine that will easily fit in a variety of locations with ease.
